messages.message: @jack.robbins who can help make the decision here?
i missed the earlier message trail here. Is this for the AIHub MT instance?

Also to add some color here  - currently there is no planned work for Saturday night maintenance. Technically the work to have this run on Sat night is very straightforward - change the schedule for cron / ICC maintenance schedule. However we have encountered instances in past where the platform upgrade can fail, and we need escalations to be handled. I will discuss internally with the stakeholders to see how we can do this from availability on weekends.
thanks Sudeep. if this is the case, i d also like ot include the AI Hub India instance since we have a couple of SG customers and India customers that we can expand with if we get this window
what is the AIHub India instance? :slightly_smiling_face: is there a ST environment for one of our customers?
yup and there are a couple coming through shortly :slightly_smiling_face:
